channel.title: Anyone help?

item.title: Anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @java_freak java freak
item.description:
@java_freak wrote:

runyluny:

nahh man it didnt work for some reason… any other codes?

right click the compiler

then select edit

and place this back in there.

@echo off
title Jaydens Compiler
if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
"%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

tell me what happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Replace whats in your compiler with this

@echo off Title Divine-Choas Compiler! "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Change this line “C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\bin\javac.exe” to the path of your jdk folder

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone help?
item.dc:creator: @runyluny runyluny
item.description:
@runyluny wrote:

Alright so I have this source and client called PK-Planet. Im sure you all have heard of it… anyway When I click compile this is the mssge that comes up.
You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is
‘about’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

now I already have Jre6 and JDK version 22! what the heck do I do. I dont mean to sound like a nooby but like I tryed everything I typed this stuff on google and nothing seemed to help me. If someone knows how to do this cna you please do it for me? I AM WILLING TO MAKE CO OWNER WITH MY SERVER. THIS IS WHAT COMES UP WHEN I CLICK EDIT.

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is
about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/…
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic
